LanguageData.SmallShelf.label: small shelf
LanguageData.SmallShelf.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings, even if outside.\n\nSince shelf space is a little limited, shelves cannot hold plants and large corpses, allow chunks, buildings.
LanguageData.Blueprint_SmallShelf.label: small shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_SmallShelf.label: small shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.Frame_SmallShelf.label: small shelf (building)
LanguageData.Frame_SmallShelf.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings, even if outside.\n\nSince shelf space is a little limited, shelves cannot hold plants and large corpses, allow chunks, buildings.
